trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático a HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlTitle class to programmatically specify the HTML `<title>` element of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de HtmlTitle para programaticamente especificar no código HTML `<title>` elemento de uma página de formulários Web.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can also set the page title by using the `title` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Também pode definir o título de página utilizando a `title` atributo o [@ página](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) diretiva, ou definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control using default values.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controlar os valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: It creates an HTML `<title>` element on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Cria um HTML `<title>` elemento na página Web.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "title" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| A cadeia de literal "title". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controlo que um elemento XML ou HTML foi analisado e adiciona esse elemento para que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> coleção do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If the element added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> control, then the AddParsedSubObject method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> property with the value of the literal string; otherwise, the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se o elemento adicionado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controlo é um <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>controlo, em seguida, os conjuntos de método AddParsedSubObject o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A>propriedade com o valor da cadeia de literal; caso contrário, a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A>método é denominado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control.
trans-unit.target: O método AddParsedSubObject é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo expandir a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o elemento analisado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> recolha para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objeto para conter controlos de servidor de subordinados do controlo de servidor atual.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controlo especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Render method first calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method using the `Title` member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de primeiro método compor o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>utilizando o método a `Title` membro o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, any child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control are rendered.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, subordinados controla do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controlo são apresentados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém o fluxo de saída a compor no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto de HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify or determine the title of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de texto para especificar ou a determinar o título da página Web.

trans-unit.source: The text of the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O texto de HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma cadeia vazia ("").
